    • Enum Constant Detail

      • STRICT

        public static final DefaultSqlValueCoercer STRICT
        Disallows conversion from STRING to BOOLEAN and numeric types.

        Generally used for everything not related to user entered literals.

      • LAX

        public static final DefaultSqlValueCoercer LAX
        Allows conversion between STRING and BOOLEAN as well as STRING and numeric types.

        Generally used for things related to user entered literals to allow for easier user input.

      • canCoerce

        public java.util.Optional<SqlType> canCoerce(SqlType from,
                                             SqlType to)
        Test is a SQL type can be coerced to another.

        Just because two types can be coerced does not mean all attempts to coerce a value of one type to the other will succeed. For example, coercing a BIGINT to a INTEGER will only succeed if the value fits.

        Parameters:
        from - the type of the values being coerced.
        to - the type the values need coercing to.
        Returns:
        type capable of holding both sides, or Result#failure() if not compatible.
